Detailed Description

Thread safe and somewhat modified version of MapStatistics.

Used for communication between the JobThread and Reader.

uint32  queueLength

Calculates the load.

Parameters:

int MapSafeVector::jobThreadCrashTimeOut (   ) 
 

Returns the current job of the jobthread if the JobThread has been busy for too long.

Returns:
-1 if the JobThread is ok.

void MapSafeVector::jobThreadIsAlive (   ) 
 

Update the jobThread time-out time to the curren.

(Used when jT will have to wait awhile, like when recieving an ack - from mapModule).

void MapSafeVector::setReaderFifo (  ReaderQueue *  fifo  ) 
 

Sets the fifo of the reader.

Ugly way to wake up the reader from sleeping.

bool MapSafeVector::setStatus (  uint32  mapID,
MapElement::status_t  status
)  [virtual]
 

Changes status for the map in question.

If status is loaded, loading etc. a new map will be added. If status is deleted the map will be removed.

Returns:
False if the map id isn't present.

Reimplemented from MapStatistics.
